result.description: Join the intense and thrilling battle for humanity's survival against monstrous Titans in this gripping manga series.
Dive into a world where magic and adventure collide, following the journey of a boy determined to become the Wizard King.
Discover the dark and gripping story of a high school student who wields a notebook with the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.
Embark on a heart-pounding quest to save humanity from demons, led by a young boy determined to avenge his family.
Experience the magical and adventurous world of a guild of wizards as they take on exciting and dangerous quests.
Uncover the humorous and heartwarming story of a spy who creates a fake family for his mission, only to discover that they are anything but ordinary.
Follow the journey of young heroes in training as they strive to become the greatest superheroes in a world where nearly everyone has superpowers.
Join the thrilling adventures of a young boy searching for his father and uncovering his true potential as a Hunter.
Follow the epic journey of a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and earning the respect of his village.
Witness the rise of an ordinary hunter who transforms into the ultimate hunter through relentless leveling and battles.
Delve into the charming and unexpected story of love and friendship between two high school students with seemingly opposite personalities.
Enter a world where a young sorcerer battles against cursed spirits to protect humanity from supernatural threats.
